00047 Process::Process() {
00048 
00049         command = NULL;
00050         cmdSize = 0;
00051         redirflag[0] = redirflag[1] = redirflag[2] = -1;
00052 }

00054 void Process::print(void) {
00055 
00056         int i;
00057         std::cout << "PID: " << pid << std::endl;
00058         std::cout << "Comandos:" << std::endl;
00059         for (i = 0; i < cmdSize; i++)
00060                 std::cout << command[i] << std::endl;
00061         std::cout << "Redirecionamento:" << std::endl;
00062         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00063                 if (redirflag[i] != -1) std::cout << i << " " << filename[i] << std::endl;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void Process::destroy(void) {
00067 
00068         if (command != NULL) {
00069                 for(int i=0; i<cmdSize; i++){
00070                         free(command[i]);
00071                 }
00072                 free(command);
00073         }
00074         command = NULL;
00075         cmdSize = 0;
00076 }

00081     cmdSize = size;

00086         return command;

00089 void Process::setFilename(std::string file, int flag){
00090 
00091         if (flag == REDIN) {
00092                 filename[0] = file;
00093                 redirflag[0] = flag;
00094         } else if (flag == REDOUTT || flag == REDOUTA) {
00095                 filename[1] = file;
00096                 redirflag[1] = flag;
00097         } else if (flag == REDERRT || flag == REDERRA) {
00098                 filename[2] = file;
00099                 redirflag[2] = flag;
00100         }
00101 }
00102 
00103 bool Process::hasRedirection (void) {
00104 
00105         return redirflag[0] != -1 || redirflag[1] != -1 || redirflag[2] != -1;
00106 }
